product_details.name: Inspirational 'Believe in Yourself' Premium Cotton T-Shirt
product_details.description:
• Stylish navy blue color perfect for casual and motivational wear
• Modern typography design with layered 'BELIEVE' text effect
• High-quality cotton material for maximum comfort
• Versatile round neck design suitable for all occasions
• Empowering message that boosts confidence and self-belief
• Durable print technology ensures long-lasting design
• Easy to care for and machine washable
• Available in multiple sizes for perfect fit
• Ideal for both casual wear and workout sessions
• Perfect gift for motivation seekers and self-improvement enthusiasts

banner_details:
This banner showcases a stylish promotional layout for a T-shirt, using a clean and modern design. The header features a bold, uppercase title text (`heading`) positioned centrally at the top, followed by a subtler, elegant tagline (`tagline`) that invites inspiration. The main focal point is a product image (`product_image`) placed within a radial burst pattern that draws attention to the center. Additional supporting text (`description`) highlights product benefits below the image. A standout price tag (`price`) in vibrant color draws quick consumer attention, and directly beneath it is a brightly colored call-to-action button (`cta_button_background`) with centralized button text (`cta`) to encourage immediate interaction. 

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy Blue: `#2C3E50`
- Medium Grayish Blue: `#34495E`
- Light Steel Blue: `#B0BEC5`
- Warm Yellow: `#F9A825`
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a navy blue t-shirt featuring a motivational print design. The main background color is a deep navy blue (#0B1E3F), offering a calm and confident base tone. The text "BELIEVE" is repeated in a slightly lighter shade of slate blue (#35465C), providing a layered depth without overpowering the base color. The script text "In yourself" is in a smooth, light pastel grayish-blue (#C3CEDA), which stands out effortlessly while blending harmoniously with the darker tones. For an advertisement banner, a color palette of navy blue (#0B1E3F), slate blue (#35465C), and soft gray-blue (#C3CEDA) will maintain a sleek, modern, and inspirational aesthetic.
